message: I'm feeling generous.  Take 100k and let's be done with this.
I'm not that generous, but I'll give you a decent share. Take it or leave it.
Let's be reasonable. I'm taking a big hit from inflation, so I need a decent share. This is my final offer.
I'm trying to be fair, but I need to get a better share to account for the inflation. This is my next best offer.
This is my last attempt to compromise. I need a bigger share to offset the inflation, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.
I'm not budging. You're going to have to make a better offer if you want me to give up more.
I'm trying to be realistic here, but I can't accept much less.  We need to find a compromise before the inflation eats away all the money.
I'm not going to give up much more. You'll have to make a serious offer if you want me to budge.
This is getting desperate. I'm willing to accept a smaller share, but this is my absolute minimum. We need to agree soon or we'll both lose everything.

I'm desperate now. This is my final offer. Take it or we both get nothing.
I'm taking everything. You can't afford to be picky at this point.
